A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow\, so terrible.  The most poorly written movie I have ever seen\, a total departure from who the characters are based on their long history.  Poor character development\, poor story telling.  This was an action movie\, so if you have never seen another star wars movie you may like it\, but if you have any history with the franchise you will walk away shaking your head\, longing for the days of Lucas.
